question:
Which of the following facts is/are correct regarding Smart Food Executive Council?
  1. It was formed under the aegis of the Smart Food Initiative launched in 2013
  2. The Smart Food initiative is founded by the International Crops Research Institute for the Semi-Arid-Tropics (ICRISAT)
  3. It is an initiative which will initially focus on popularizing wheat and paddy
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: The Smart Food initiative is founded by the International Crops Research Institute for the Semi-Arid-Tropics (ICRISAT).It is an initiative which will initially focus on popularizing millets and sorghum.
